About Me Portfolio Contact Newsletter

Hi, my name is Lyla aka Jar of Eyes Games. I'm a TTRPG designer and project lead with a decade-long career in instructional design and technology with the Peace Corps, Udacity, and Google. I'm the project lead for the Cosmere RPG and best known for my game Jukebox: The Karaoke Musical TTRPG.

Stay up-to-date on my work by subscribing to the Jar of Eyes Game Gazette
